amendment.description: An amendment numbered 98 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for the implementation and enforcement of the Environmental Protection Agency's final rule entitled "Clean Water Act Section 401 Water Quality Certification Improvement Rule.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
